Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03

Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.messages

  • Class
    Description
    AvailableColorMessage
    The AvailableColorMessage class represents a message used to communicate the available colors which can be selected by a player.
    ChangeStateMessage
    This class represents a message that indicates a change in the game state.
    ChoiceObjectiveMessage
    The ChoiceObjectiveMessage class represents a message that updates the objective card in the client's model for the player who has selected the objective card.
    ChooseObjectiveMessage
    The ChooseObjectiveMessage class represents a message sent by the client to select his personal objective card
    ChooseStartingMessage
    The ChooseStartingMessage class represents a message sent by the client to select the side of his starting card
    CommonObjectiveMessage
    The CommonObjectiveMessage class represent a message to notify the players about the two common objective cards on the game table
    ConfirmChatMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to send a chat message
    ConfirmChooseObjectiveMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his personal objective card
    ConfirmDrawMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his personal objective card
    ConfirmGameMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the creation of a game
    ConfirmJoinGameMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to join the game
    ConfirmMessage
    This is an abstract type of message sent as confirmation to some operations
    ConfirmPickColorMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his color
    ConfirmPlaceMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the placing of a card
    ConfirmRejoinGameMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to rejoin the game
    ConfirmStartingCardMessage
    This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of the side of his starting card
    CrashedPlayerMessage
    This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the crashing of a player
    CreateGameMessage
    This message represents the request to create a game
    CurrentPlayerMessage
    This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the new current player
    DrawGoldMessage
    This message represents the request to draw a gold card
    DrawResourceMessage
    This message represents the request to draw a resource card
    DrawTableMessage
    This message represents the request to draw a card from the game table
    FinalColorsMessage
    This message is used to update all the players about the color of each other
    FirstHandMessage
    This message represents the first notification sent to a player about his personal cards, his starting card and the two objective cards from which he will have to choose
    GroupChatMessage
    This message represents the request to send a group message to all the players in the game
    HeartbeatMessage
    This message represents the heartbeat used to check the TCP connection between client and server
    JoinedPlayerMessage
    This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that a new player has joined the game
    JoinGameMessage
    This message represents the request to join a game
    LastRoundMessage
    This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game that the final round has started
    Message
    Abstract structure of a Message
    MessageType
    Enum representing all the type of messages sent over the network
    NotifyCommonTableMessage
    This message represents the notification to all players connected in game about one of the six cards on the game table that has changed
    NotifyNumPlayersReachedMessage
    This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that the number of player has been reached, so the game can start
    PersonalCardsMessage
    This message notifies the player who has drawn a card about their new cards in hand
    PickColorMessage
    This message represent the request to pick a color
    PlaceCardMessage
    This message represents the request to place a card
    PlayerBoardMessage
    This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that a player has placed a card
    PrivateChatMessage
    This message represents the request to send a private message
    RejoinedPlayerMessage
    This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that player has rejoined the game
    RejoinGameMessage
    This message represents the request to rejoin the game
    StartingCommonMessage
    This message represents the first notification to all the players about the six cards that can be drawn from the game table
    TurnOrderMessage
    This message represents the notification to all the players in game about the players turn order
    UpdateCrashedPlayerMessage
    This message represents a notification to a rejoined player containing all the information of the game when the player rejoined to update his client model
    UpdatePointsMessage
    This message represents a notification to all the players connected in game that a player has earned points
    WinnersMessage
    This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the winners of the game
